pull.title: [qa] Use single cache dir for chains
pull.body:
Currently the test framework would just create a folder "cache" in the pwd. This is bad practice and causes confusion (e.g. when the tests fail depending on what your current pwd is).

This also includes two other cleanup commits.

events.message: [qa] Sort scripts by time for pull_tester and don't overwrite setup_chain
[qa] Adjust timeouts for micro-optimization of run time
[qa] Use single cache dir for chains

events.body: Tests seem to pass except for walletbackup / wallet-dump that have been failing intermittently anyways.
